photo.title: P1010012

photo.description: La ciudad de Pisa está dividida en dos partes por el río Arno, dos partes enfrentadas durante siglos. Si el norte tiene la Piazza dei Miracoli, el sur, en la foto, tiene la pequeña iglesia gótica de Santa Maria della Spina. The city of Pisa is divided in two parts by the river Arno, two parts confronted through the centuries. If the north part has the Piazza dei Miracoli, the south, in the photo, has the small gothic church of Santa Maria della Spina.
